pullrequest.title: Catch (almost) all typos that are passed to ign-cmake functions or macros

content.raw: We have utilities for gathering all the source files in a directory so that we don't need to modify the cmake scripts in order to add new tests. This lets us keep a uniform directory structure and nearly identical scripts between all the projects, and reduces the maintenance that we need to perform on our many build systems.
